Model: sofa.models.Product

Defined in:
sofa-core/src/sofa.models.product.js:2
Dependencies:
None
Package:
sofa-core
Package dependencies:
None

Installation

  1. Getting the source

    You can access this model by installing the sofa-core package. Installing this package is as easy as running one of the following commands:

    • Via npm:

      npm install sofa-core

    • Via Bower:

      bower install sofa-core

    • Via Git:

      git clone http://github.com/sofa/sofa-core

  2. Embedding the source

    After that, embed the distribution file in your HTML document.

    <script src="dist/sofa.core.js"></script>

    Don't forget that each package defines its own package dependencies. Make sure to embed their files too if needed.

  3. Use it!

    After that, you can inject this service by using Angular's dependency injection system:

    angular.module('yourApp').controller('FooController', ['sofa.models.Product', function (sofa.models.Product) {

}]);

Description

A model that represents a Product object and adds convenient methods to it.

Methods

  • getImage(size)

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.product.js:14

    Returns the url to the product image by a given size. If no image exists in that size, it returns a placeholder image url.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    size string

    Image size identifier.

    Returns

    string

    Image url.

  • getAllImages()

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.product.js:37

    Returns all images of the product in size 'large'.

    Returns

    array

    Array of image urls.

  • hasMultipleImages()

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.product.js:56

    Returns true if a product supports multiple images.

    Returns

    boolean

  • hasBasePrice()

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.product.js:70

    Returns true if a product has a base price.

    Returns

    boolean

  • getBasePrice(Optional)

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.product.js:84

    Returns the base price per unit. When variant is passed, return the base price for this variant.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    Optional variant

    variant object

    Returns

    Number

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.product.js:104
